RCA Summary: A null pointer exception caused the application to crash.
A memory leak in the OrderProcessor module increased memory usage.
Concurrent transactions caused a deadlock on OrdersTable.
Network latency caused repeated payment timeout errors.
Improper log rotation configuration caused logs to grow unchecked.
Brute-force login attempts overwhelmed the authentication service.
Missing index on the CustomerTable caused slow query performance.
Application crash caused by a null pointer exception.
